request.description: Entry point to delete an existing authentication token.

item.name: Login with user with no access

exec: pm.test("Login successful. The account displayed in response matches with credentials and has not admin rights.", function () {
pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to create services.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to add a service");
pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to edit services.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to edit a service");
pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to delete services.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to delete a service");
pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to list services.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to access services");

item.name: Show available services filtered with host group 1 or host category 1

exec: pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to list services.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to access services");

item.name: Logout from user with no access

exec: pm.test("Logout successful. The displayed message is the one that is expected ('Successful logout').", function() {
